dmca.title: DMCA: ies-midsouth.net
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: James Cardwell [mailto:james.cardwell@ezot.com] 
Posted At: Thursday, November 16, 2006 3:10 PM
Posted To: DMCA Houston
Conversation: DMCA: ies-midsouth.net
Subject: DMCA: ies-midsouth.net


EZOT, Inc.
9597 Jones Road
PMB 239
Houston, Texas 77065

November 16, 2006
Chris Newcomb
Everyone's Internet Ltd.
390 Benmar Suite 200
Houston, Texas 77060
Dear Copyright Agent:
This letter is to provide you notice that customer on your system is
violating the copyright of EZOT, Inc. by displaying images and using a
site design that was created on our systems.  We have a good faith
belief that use of the Infringing Material by your client is not
authorized by EZOT, Inc., its agents, or the law.  I certify under
penalty of perjury that the information contained in this letter is
accurate, and I am authorized to act on behalf of EZOT, Inc.

The specific works, graphics or other material EZOT, Inc. believes to be
infringed or to be the subject of infringing activity (the "Infringing
Material") are listed as follows:

http://www.ies-midsouth.com/images/menu/bkgrnd.gif
http://www.ies-midsouth.com/images/menu/a1.jpg
http://www.ies-midsouth.com/images/images/menu/sel_14.gif
http://www.ies-midsouth.com/images/menu/over_14.gif
http://www.ies-midsouth.comimages/menu/124.gif
http://www.ies-midsouth.com/images/menu/over_124.gif
http://www.ies-midsouth.com/images/menu/92.gif
http://www.ies-midsouth.com/images/menu/over_92.gif
http://www.ies-midsouth.com/images/menu/19.gif
http://www.ies-midsouth.com/images/menu/over_19.gif
http://www.ies-midsouth.com/images/menu/23.gif
http://www.ies-midsouth.com/images/menu/over_23.gif
http://www.ies-midsouth.com/images/menu/27.gif
http://www.ies-midsouth.com/images/menu/over_27.gif
http://www.ies-midsouth.com/images/menu/40.gif
http://www.ies-midsouth.com/images/menu/over_40.gif
http://www.ies-midsouth.com/images/menu/30.gif
http://www.ies-midsouth.com/images/menu/over_30.gif
http://www.ies-midsouth.com/images/menu/i11.jpg
http://www.ies-midsouth.com/images/menu/i12.jpg
http://www.ies-midsouth.com/images/menu/i13.jpg
http://www.ies-midsouth.com/images/menu/i4.jpg
http://www.ies-midsouth.com/images/menu/a1f.jpg

We ask that you make the site inaccessible until such time as they
remove all offending content per your terms of service and the DMCA.
 
Sincerely,
James N. Cardwell, Jr.
EZOT, Inc.
